segments.text: I can't believe how much water is on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman must have a very strong focus to ignore all of this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are taking advantage of her distraction.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the boy is carefully balancing on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl seems to be his lookout, ready to catch any falling cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they've done this before.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's apron looks like it's seen better days.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit sorry for her, being taken advantage of like this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window lets in a lot of light, illuminating the entire scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone comes to help soon.
segments.speaker: PAR
